resources.string: Giuseppe Cafiero sets out to trace, in this book and through a penetrating imagination, a psychological construction of Edgar Allan Poe through the different characters in his works by creating 16 short stories and a prologue that recount Poe life Each of the tales is constructed through surreal events and the presence of particular characters, so that each story can outline from life a particular year in the life of Edgar Allan Poe. A memory necessary to fully understand what it was about Poes life, marked by abuse and strangeness, that enabled this incredible writer to sketch a will conquered by the inescapable pleasure of writing
